trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
There were no other sightings in Reading on or around September 22nd 2007
divs: Sighting Details While taking a break at work, in Green Hills PA., and watching the night sky, myself - MUFON Field Investigator #11528 and a MUFON State Section Director, observed a white in color, star like, anomaly moving at a very high rate of speed in comparison to the jets observed at the same moment. It moved in a SW to NE direction. The anamoly did not move in a straight, direct path, it instead appeared to move in slight serpentine motion. From the observation point the object covered the distance of horizon to horizon in approximately 20 seconds total, although we only noticed it when it was almost directly above us. When first observed the anamoly was a noticeably bright white object. The rate of speed the anamoly was moving made it immediately stand out. It then faded from view near the NE horizon. No noise was heard - no physical effects felt - we felt elated
Summary: Fastwalker observed moving SW to NE
